member.name: M:JetBrains.ProjectModel.NuGet.PackageManagement.NuGetSolutionManager.GetNuGetProjectSafeName(NuGet.ProjectManagement.NuGetProject)
member.summary: Return short name if it's non-ambiguous. Return CustomUniqueName for projects that have ambigous names (such as same project name under different solution folder) Example: return Folder1/ProjectA if there are both ProjectA under Folder1 and Folder2
